perturbation.original_text: The Manufacturer covenants that it is and will remain for the term of this agreement in compliance with any and all Local Laws and Regulations. This includes without limitation laws relating to business practice, workplace relations, safety and taxation.
perturbation.changed_text: The Manufacturer will endeavor to comply with applicable Local Laws and Regulations. This may include laws relating to business practice, workplace relations, safety and taxation.
perturbation.explanation: The change from 'covenants that it is and will remain in compliance' to 'will endeavor to comply' weakens the legal obligation, making compliance discretionary rather than mandatory. The change of 'includes' to 'may include' means that the listing of laws is optional.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Failure to be in compliance with Local Laws and Regulations could contradict business law and regulations of Vanuatu, where the Manufacturer is located.

perturbation.original_text: The Manufacturer covenants that it is and will remain for the term of this agreement in compliance with all International standards in production and manufacturing.
perturbation.changed_text: The Manufacturer will aim to meet International standards in production and manufacturing.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase 'will aim to meet' is vague and doesn't guarantee compliance with international standards. This introduces ambiguity and weakens the obligation on the Manufacturer.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Failure to comply with International Standards of Manufacturing contradicts global manufacturing guidelines and regulatory requirements.

perturbation.original_text: The Customer covenants that it is and will remain for the term of this agreement in compliance with any and all Local Laws and Regulations. This includes without limitation laws relating to business practice, workplace relations, safety and taxation.
perturbation.changed_text: The Customer will use commercially reasonable efforts to comply with Local Laws and Regulations. This could include laws relating to business practice, workplace relations, safety and taxation.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'covenants that it is and will remain' with 'will use commercially reasonable efforts' introduces ambiguity regarding the extent of compliance required. 'Could include' makes it so the company does not need to include the following laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Failure to fully comply with Local Laws and Regulations contradicts business law and regulations of Hong Kong, where the Customer is located.
